com.stormpath.sdk.provider.social

Interface UserInfoMappingRulesBuilder


  • public interface UserInfoMappingRulesBuilder
    A Builder to construct UserInfoMappingRulesBuilder resources. Use example: UserInfoMappingRulesBuilder userInfoMappingRulesBuilder = UserInfoMappingRulesBuilder.rulesBuilder() .addUserInfoMappingRule(userInfoMappingRule1) .addUserInfoMappingRule(userInfoMappingRule2) ... .build();
    Since:
    1.3.0
    See Also:
    UserInfoMappingRulesBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserInfoMappingRulesBuilder addUserInfoMappingRule(UserInfoMappingRule userInfoMappingRule)
      Adds a new UserInfoMappingRule to the set of UserInfoMappingRules, indicating how a fields from the userInfo provided by the social provider should populate one or more Stormpath Account field values after a successful Social login.
      UserInfoMappingRules build()
      Builds a new UserInfoMappingRules instance based on the state of this builder.

    • Method Detail

      • addUserInfoMappingRule

        UserInfoMappingRulesBuilder addUserInfoMappingRule(UserInfoMappingRule userInfoMappingRule)
        Adds a new UserInfoMappingRule to the set of UserInfoMappingRules, indicating how a fields from the userInfo provided by the social provider should populate one or more Stormpath Account field values after a successful Social login.
        Parameters:
        userInfoMappingRule - the UserInfoMappingRule to add to the UserInfoMappingRules object.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • build

        UserInfoMappingRules build()
        Builds a new UserInfoMappingRules instance based on the state of this builder.
        Returns:
        a new UserInfoMappingRules instance.
